headline: Stock Market Today, Dec. 17: Comcast Jumps Again on Activist Investor Buzz and Versant Spinoff
summary: Comcast is pushing upward due to activist buzz, positive spin-off reception and a successful expansion today, Dec. 17, 2025.

headline: Why the Market Dipped But Comcast (CMCSA) Gained Today
summary: The latest trading day saw Comcast (CMCSA) settling at $30.32, representing a +1.98% change from its previous close.

headline: Comcast to Host Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: PHILADELPHIA, December 17, 2025--Comcast Corporation will host a conference call with the financial community to discuss financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2025 on Thursday, January 29, 2026, at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time (ET). Comcast will issue a press release reporting its results earlier that morning.

headline: Comcast (CMCSA) Grows 5% on Connecticut Expansion
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Shining Bright Amid Wall Street’s Dull Spell. Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is one of the top performers on Tuesday. headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher as Global Rate Cut Hopes Build
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Wednesday, Dec, 17 2025 US stock futures are edging higher before the open, with contracts tied to the S&P 500 up about 0.1 percent as investors digest softer economic signals at home and a fresh wave of rate cut hopes from overseas. In the United Kingdom, inflation fell to 3.2 percent in November, the lowest in eight months, boosting expectations that its central bank will cut borrowing costs and serving as a reminder that global interest rates may...

headline: Stock Market News: New York City gets casinos, Palantir and Databricks
summary: The nonfarm payroll, also known as the jobs report, was released on Tuesday, December 16. Although it did not change significantly from September, the October report was delayed due to the government shutdown, it still paints a bleak economic picture. headline: Review & Preview: A Data Washout
summary: The economic data were muddled.  The Nasdaq Composite managed to eke out a 0.2% gain after being down as much as 0.6% earlier in the day.  The slump seemed to hinge on an economic data dump that proved a mixed bag, at best.
